column4: I am leaving home with Simon Cantier as pianears to go with the Company of pianears to finde a location for the Saints Some whair in the west
Just arrived at the main camp on the west side of the Missouri river. Likely leave in the morning.
Leaving Winter Quarters with 6 of my teams
We've gone about 4 miles. We formed an encampment with several others in my division.
I am heading back to Winter Quarters for the conference tomorrow.
It has been decided that several of the Twelve, with a company of pioneers, numbering in all, 143 souls, will leave "Winter Quarters".
We intend to explore the country, and find a place the most suitable for forming a settlement.
